subject: Lacrosse
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: The Virginia men’s lacrosse player charged with murder in the death of a women’s lacrosse player told police officers that he shook her, according to an affidavit.
snippet: The Virginia men’s lacrosse player charged with murder in the death of a women’s lacrosse player told police officers that he shook her, according to an affidavit.
